name: expencexpert
description: ExpenseXpert - Full Stack Expense Tracking Application

scripts.install-all: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../server && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.dev: echo "To run the client, open a new terminal and run: npm run dev --prefix client" && echo "To run the server, open another new terminal and run: npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm start"
